item.title: Impacket
item.description: Install pip install pcapy pip install impacket Usage ‚ùå Error: ip.get_th_sport doesn’t display ports

item.title: Scapy
item.description: Install Download MacTex here and install. Install SoX. Then, the following [steps](pip install –pre scapy[complete]) are tested on MacOSX:

item.title: Dshell
item.description: Installing Install with Python3. sudo python3 -m pip install [tar_file] # option 1 pip install dshell # option 2.

item.title: BTFM
item.description: Dshell # MacOSX path to directory with pyenv (example): /Users/[user_name]/.pyenv/versions/3.8.5/envs/python3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dshell/ decode -l # list decoders decode -d [decoder_name] # decoder info # who talked to whom decode -d ip [capture_file_name].
